secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:actsec_c45123:Drive a car] using acceleration.
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_b772:acceleration].
3. Calculate [OBJ:expsec_di2153:average acceleration and instantaneous acceleration].
3. Define [OBJ:actsec_ya43:constant acceleration] by observing rabbits.
4. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_b774:effect of changing the acceleration] on the magnitude and direction of velocity.
5. Drive a car and collect data to [OBJ:actsec_c45552d:determine the carâ€™s constant acceleration].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37421:Calculate] acceleration.
2. [OBJ:qc_57031:Calculate] constant acceleration using the driving activity.
